Protective Vines.name: Protective Vines
Protective Vines.fullText:
Favored of Mielikki Attack 11Protective Vines

Mielikki causes a growth of plants to constrict your foes and protect your friends.

Encounter        Charm
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each enemy in the blast

Attack: Your highest ability score modifier + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Your highest ability score modifier + 9 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d6 + your highest ability score modifier damage. The target is slowed and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 3d6 + your highest ability score modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 68.
Protective Vines.flavor: Mielikki causes a growth of plants to constrict your foes and protect your friends.

Close blast 5

Target: Each enemy in the blast

Attack: Your highest ability score modifier + 6 vs. Reflex

Call of the Forest.name: Call of the Forest
Call of the Forest.fullText:
Favored of Mielikki Attack 20Call of the Forest

You draw on your connection to primal nature to cause constricting verdant growth to ensnare your enemies.

Daily        Zone
Standard Action      Area burst 3 within 10

Target: Each creature in the burst

Attack: Your highest ability score modifier + 9 vs. Will

Hit: 3d8 + highest ability modifier damage and the target is restrained (save ends).

Effect: The burst creates a zone of verdant growth. The verdant growth is difficult terrain and heavily obscured. Each enemy that ends its turn in the zone takes 10 damage or falls prone (enemy’s choice). Each beast ally and plant ally within the zone gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 68.

Treestride.name: Treestride
Treestride.fullText:
Favored of Mielikki Utility 12Treestride

Your faith in Mielikki opens pathways that only creatures as close to nature as dryads can see.

Daily        Teleportation
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use a minor action to teleport up to 20 squares if you begin and end the teleport adjacent to a plant or plant creature of Large size or larger.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 68.
